content.rendered:
The service involves building or rebuilding a website based on a responsive/mobile-ready Wordpress platform.
A WordPress site build project includes:
  • Installing and configuring WordPress on a development subdomain
  • Finding & installing a suitable WordPress theme
  • Creating or adapting a company logo & other graphics
  • Creating an attractive homepage / landing page
  • Migrating or creating written copy
  • Placing client-provided graphics & photographs on the site
  • Performing on-site SEO – fixing meta data & implementing structured data to improve search engine rankings
  • Optimizing the website for mobile performance & testing it using the Google speed test
  • Setting up contact forms

excerpt.rendered:
A simple Wordpress Website Build, 1-5 pages.
The service involves building or rebuilding a website based on a responsive/mobile-ready Wordpress platform.
